Module Collections
Package collections.bits

Class IntBits

java.lang.Object
collections.bits.IntBits
public class IntBits extends Object
The IntBits class represents a collection of bits stored in an integer. It provides basic operations for setting, clearing, finding the next set or clear bit, and comparing with another instance.
Since:
1.0

    • nextClearBit

      public int nextClearBit(int fromIndex)
      Finds and returns the index of the next clear bit, starting from the specified index.
      Parameters:
      fromIndex - The starting index for the search.
      Returns:
      The index of the next clear bit, or -1 if no clear bit is found.

    • nextSetBit

      public int nextSetBit(int fromIndex)
      Finds and returns the index of the next set bit, starting from the specified index.
      Parameters:
      fromIndex - The starting index for the search.
      Returns:
      The index of the next set bit, or -1 if no set bit is found.

    • matches

      public boolean matches(IntBits other)
      Checks if the same bits are set as another instance of IntBits.
      Parameters:
      other - The other IntBits instance to compare.
      Returns:
      true if the bits are the same, false otherwise.

    • anyMatch

      public boolean anyMatch(IntBits other)
      Checks if any of the bits are similar to another instance of IntBits.
      Parameters:
      other - The other IntBits instance to compare.
      Returns:
      true if any of the bits are the same, false otherwise.

    • getBits

      public int getBits()
      Gets the value of the bits stored in the int.
